name: D-FORE!
description:
What is D-Fore?

Hit your d20 through a series of changing levels in our minigolf sim! Every whack brings some new power or change to the environment, so pick your shots carefully!

Features seven fully changing levels, an incredible five ball powers, and level skips galore! Can you hit a hole in one on every course?

This game was built in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam!

Team: 

Ethan Bowen - Engineer

Penny Lewis - UI/Level Designer

Josh Bowen - Engineer

MJ Galicha - UI Engineer

Tanner Brown - Artist
